channel.title: Datmaker/ custom item help PLZ
channel.description:
My datmaker suck at doing its job or something because for some reason it cant make DAT files of models suspended in air. All the drop models of weapons work, but the weild model doesnt. they are both the same model, just different positioning. Even when i recolored a helmet in metasequoia to test to see if it was just my models, datmaker screwed it up.
[img]http://i249.photobucket.com/albums/gg206/Reisyukaku/1.png?t=1248681727[/img] Here is the original .mdl i got from RSMV
[img]http://i249.photobucket.com/albums/gg206/Reisyukaku/2.png?t=1248681726[/img] now here it is as a .mqo
and now here it is a .dat (notice i have the correct stuff selected) [img]http://i249.photobucket.com/albums/gg206/Reisyukaku/3.png?t=1248681727[/img] that doesnt look like a helm to me PLZ help ....and sorry for the long post

item.title: Datmaker/ custom item help PLZ
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

No problem.

Yep, that’s server side, list the item id of the helmet in the hat section of the item.java, and item4.java if you have one.

Read full topic

item.title: Datmaker/ custom item help PLZ
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

THANKS! …it worked… also would you happen to know why my helmets that i make go in the right hand when i put them on? …they appear on the head, they are in the wrong slot though.

Read full topic

item.title: Datmaker/ custom item help PLZ
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Yeahh that was a glitch in the version 1.37b, i informed MrPotatoHead, the owner of the program, and he fixed it.
Here’s the fixed version.

http://uppit.com/v/phlm2qid

Read full topic
